content: Monday 7.10 we are closed after 15.00  New Menu arrives next week, bringing our old friend Ahvenleipä back. 🐟🍞 Next Monday 7.10 we serve luch until 15 and evening we are closed preparing the new menu. Tuesday open normally and chance to get the first bite of the new F/W 19 Menu 🍝 #pumpkin #ahvenleipä
